about_the_game:
Calendar Notess: Transform Your Daily Plans into Art

"Calendar Notess" turns calendar management into art. Taking notes on days, adding tags, tracking completion statuses, adding special icons to the calendar, visualizing all this information with graphs, and the ability to export to PDF... All these features offer an experience that goes beyond just organizing your daily life.

Main Features:

  • Tagging and Status Tracking: Add tags to your notes and mark your tasks as 'Done' to easily manage and track all your tasks.
  • Customizable Icons: Add special icons to your days to personalize your calendar. Quickly recognize important days and tasks with visual cues.
  • Advanced Graphing: Visualize your notes and tags with various graphs. Easily analyze your progress and efficiency.
  • PDF Export: Export your calendar and notes to PDF. Save and share your plans outside the digital world.
How Does It Make a Difference?
"Calendar Notess" is not just a calendar app, but also a tool that enriches your daily life. It contains all the details that will make your day more efficient, whether in your personal or professional life. It maximizes time management by keeping your events, meetings, tasks, and special moments together.
Who Is It For?
It's ideal for people of all ages and professions. Students, professionals, managers, home administrators, and more... If you want to manage your time effectively, visualize your plans, and enjoy every moment, "Calendar Notess" is the right choice for you.
Get Started!
Managing your time and organizing your life has never been this easy and enjoyable. Transform your plans into art with "Calendar Notess" and live every day with maximum efficiency. Download now and discover the innovative face of calendar management!

name: Calendar Notess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 1.4Ghz
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: "Calendar Notess" turns calendar management into art. Taking notes on days, adding tags, tracking completion statuses, adding special icons to the calendar, visualizing all this information with graphs, and the ability to export to PDF...
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
